subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han compound|化|十|c1=p|c2=s|t2=stalk and leaves|ls=psc|no_och1=1}}. The top component in {{l|zh|華}} has been simplified to a phonetic element {{l|zh|化}}.

This character first appeared in the 1956 {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme}} by the People's Republic of China<!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 --> and is not known to have existed prior to that.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text: {{zh-see|華}} <!-- Not a variant form of 华 as Dictionary of Chinese Character Variants cites 大陸《簡化字總表．第二表》 and 《中日朝漢字字形對照》 as source of reference -->
